description.Name: description
description.Value:
Jamis 2011 Dakar XCT 1 Available at www.rbinc-sports.com 79 Wingold ave 416 787 4998 x0 We actually changed the frame on this to a Dakar XCT 2 but same parts.

SPECIFICATIONS
Frame

Kinesium alloy, 130mm travel mp4 linkage design, cartridge bearing pivots, tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, Rock Shox Monarch R shock with 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger

Fork

Suntour SF9-EPICON LOD 15QLC, air spring, hydraulic SpeedLock with external rebound damping, 32mm stanchions, tapered alloy steerer, 140mm travel

Headset

FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack

Wheels

Mavic XM317 disc-specific rims, 32H, eyeletted, Formula alloy 15mm thru-axle front and 12 x 135mm thru-axle rear disc hubs, Maxle Lite rear axle, DT Swiss Champion spokes

Tires

Geax Saguaro, 26 x 2.2" front and 2.0" rear

Derailleurs

Shimano SLX M662 Shadow rear and Deore M591 34.9mm top pull front

Shiftlevers

Shimano Deore M590 Rapidfire Plus, 9-speed

Chain

KMC Z99

Cassette

SRAM PG-950, 9-speed, 11-34

Crankset

FSA AlphaDrive, 44/32/22, 170mm (13-15"), 175mm (17-21")

BB Set

FSA PowerDrive, splined, 73 x 121mm

Pedals

N/A

Brakeset

Avid Juicy 3 hydraulic disc brakes with 185mm front & 160mm rear rotors

Handlebar

Ritchey Mountain Rizer, 31.8 x 20mm rise x 670mm

Stem

Ritchey 4-bolt OS, 6º x 90mm (13-15"), 100mm (17-19") & 120mm (21")

Grips

Jamis Lock-On, dual density

Seat Post

Ritchey 2B OS, 31.6 x 400mm with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin

Saddle

WTB Vigo Sport, steel rails

Sizes

13", 15", 17", 19", 21"

Color

Ano Grey/Ano Black

Weight

30.00 lbs
